spell_tooltip.description: Nature's Swiftness summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 53 yards by 15% for 15 sec.

Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift, Gust of Wind, Wind Shear, and Nature Totems by 4.0 sec.

Interrupt duration reduced by 65% on Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning casts.
Surging Totem is 50% more effective and costs 60% less mana.
Heals the friendly target for 321,852, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 332,622, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 325,576, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 413,938 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 407,616 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 406,306 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 292,324 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 104,710 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 15,965 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 381,762 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 381,034 and an additional 298,032 over 24 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 459,438 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 207364.7.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 5% increased health for 10 sec.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
The lowest health target of Healing Tide Totem is healed for 30% more and receives 15% increased healing from you for 4 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 926,411 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and casting Chain Heal on a target affected by Riptide consumes Riptide, increasing the healing of your Chain Heal by 30%.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 381,562 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 240,081 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Increases Riptide's duration by 6.0 sec and its healing over time by 20%.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 25% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

Earthliving receives 150% additional benefit from Mastery: Deep Healing.

Healing Surge always triggers Earthliving on its target.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 177,754. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
Surging Totem heals for 150% more during Ascendance.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 637,883 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.
Increases the healing done by Surging Totem by 25%.
Allies affected by your Earthen Wall Totem, Ancestral Protection Totem, and Earthliving effect receive 15% increased healing from you.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
Heals the friendly target for 328,064, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 322,795, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 377,866 and an additional 298,032 over 24 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 469,047 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 208754.2.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge, Unleash Life, or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Summons a totem at your feet for 18 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 52 yards for 30% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 926,411 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.

Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.

Earthliving receives 150% additional benefit from Mastery: Deep Healing.

Healing Surge always triggers Earthliving on its target.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 534,010 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Chills the target with frost, causing 104,951 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and its movement speed effect lasts an additional 2 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 381,762 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 30% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 9,572 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 25,222 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 28,210 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 8,610 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
